thread.title: 'Beating' human heart cells help spur drug discovery

title: 'Beating' human heart cells help spur drug discovery
text:
'Beating' human heart cells help spur drug discovery 1:08pm GMT - 01:54 
InoCardia, a spin-off from Coventry University, is using donated human heart tissue to replicate the 'beating' action of heart muscle to aid pre-clinical testing of new drugs. Matthew Stock reports.   
InoCardia, a spin-off from Coventry University, is using donated human heart tissue to replicate the 'beating' action of heart muscle to aid pre-clinical testing of new drugs. Matthew Stock reports.  //reut.rs/2poWulC
